properties.name: lastfm2spotify.lastfm-ms.web.accepted-origin-host
properties.description: Host for which requests may be handled by the application (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing).

properties.name: lastfm2spotify.api.lastfm.base-url
properties.description: Base URL of LastFM API (see: https://www.last.fm/api/intro).

properties.name: lastfm2spotify.api.lastfm.single-page-limit
properties.description: Max number of results from LastFM API per single request.
